org.apereo.cas.authentication

接口 AuthenticationPolicy

  • 所有超级接口:
    org.springframework.core.Ordered
    所有已知子接口:
    ContextualAuthenticationPolicy<T>

    public interface AuthenticationPolicy
extends org.springframework.core.Ordered
    Strategy interface for pluggable authentication security policies.
    从以下版本开始:
    4.0.0

    • 字段概要

      • 从接口继承的字段 org.springframework.core.Ordered

        HIGHEST_PRECEDENCE, LOWEST_PRECEDENCE

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 默认方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      default int getOrder() 
      boolean isSatisfiedBy(Authentication authentication)
      Determines whether an authentication event isSatisfiedBy arbitrary security policy.

    • 方法详细资料

      • isSatisfiedBy

        boolean isSatisfiedBy(Authentication authentication)
        Determines whether an authentication event isSatisfiedBy arbitrary security policy.
        参数:
        authentication - Authentication event to examine for compliance with security policy.
        返回:
        True if authentication isSatisfiedBy security policy, false otherwise.

      • getOrder

        default int getOrder()
        指定者:
        getOrder 在接口中 org.springframework.core.Ordered
